summary: Completed testing of Camp Baraisa billing features and UI updates. All requested features verified working: 1) Billing page fee editing including default camp fee, 2) Camp fee auto-select in Create Invoice dialog, 3) Stripe charge dialog with 3.5% fee breakdown, 4) Campers page Call/Text/Email buttons, 5) Photo zoom modal implementation, 6) Large Utah logo on login page.
seed_data_creation: Used existing test campers and invoices
context_for_next_testing_agent: All billing features working correctly. Backend API tests created for fee CRUD operations including editing default camp fee. Frontend verified: fee editing dialog, auto-select camp fee in invoice creation, Stripe charge dialog with 3.5% fee breakdown, contact buttons on Campers page.

billing_page.manage_fees_dialog: PASS - Opens with Add New Fee form and Existing Fees list
billing_page.default_camp_fee_display: PASS - Shows 'Camp Fee' with 'Default' badge, $3,475 amount
billing_page.fee_edit_button: PASS - Edit button (blue pencil icon) visible for all fees including default
billing_page.fee_edit_mode: PASS - Shows editable inputs for name, amount, description with Save/Cancel buttons
billing_page.fee_update_api: PASS - PUT /api/fees/{fee_id} works for default and custom fees
billing_page.charge_button: PASS - 'Charge' button visible in Actions column for invoices with balance
billing_page.stripe_dialog: PASS - Opens 'Charge Credit Card' dialog with invoice details
billing_page.fee_breakdown_3_5_percent: PASS - Shows 'Credit Card Processing Fee (3.5%)' section with Payment Amount, Processing Fee, Total Charge

create_invoice_dialog.camper_search: PASS - Search input for camper/parent name with dropdown results
create_invoice_dialog.camp_fee_auto_select: PASS - Camp Fee checkbox is auto-checked when dialog opens
create_invoice_dialog.fee_selection_highlight: PASS - Selected fee has orange background highlight
create_invoice_dialog.invoice_total_calculation: PASS - Shows $3,475 total when camp fee is selected

campers_page.contact_column: PASS - Contact column header visible in table
campers_page.call_button: PASS - Green phone icon button with data-testid='call-camper-{id}'
campers_page.text_button: PASS - Blue message icon button with data-testid='text-camper-{id}'
campers_page.email_button: PASS - Purple mail icon button with data-testid='email-camper-{id}'
campers_page.photo_zoom_implementation: PASS - Code verified: cursor-pointer class, onClick handler, zoom modal component

login_page.utah_logo_size: PASS - Logo has w-72 h-72 classes (288x288px)
login_page.logo_visibility: PASS - Utah logo prominently displayed above login form

backend_api_tests.test_get_fees: PASS - Returns fees list with default camp fee
backend_api_tests.test_create_fee: PASS - Creates new fee with name, amount, description
backend_api_tests.test_update_fee: PASS - Updates default camp fee amount successfully
backend_api_tests.test_update_custom_fee: PASS - Updates custom fee name and amount
backend_api_tests.test_cannot_delete_default_fee: PASS - Returns 400 when trying to delete default fee

mocked_apis.stripe_checkout: Stripe is configured in test mode (sk_test_emergent) - checkout redirects to Stripe test environment
